meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Deepa Zavatsky Keith Whitener Betsy Chisolm Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6463.

td.p: Deepa Zavatsky, an attorney from Princeton, New Jersey
Keith Whitener, a research chemist originally from Charlotte, North Carolina
Betsy Chisolm, a volunteer storyteller from Greeley, Colorado (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,999)

tr.td: THE RUM DIARIES
GREAT IDEAS
BEASTLY COLLECTIVES
TV THEME SONG HITS
(Alex: You have to identify the TV show.)
THE ELECTORAL COLLEGE
WHICH WORD IS MIZPELED?

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Day 1:
I wish I were still this "sweet" perennial grass, but I seem to have another destiny')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Day 1:
I wish I were still this "sweet" perennial grass, but I seem to have another destiny

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 12):

tr.td: Betsy
Keith
Deepa

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Betsy
Keith
Deepa
THE FORMER EASTERN BLOC
COMMUNICATION
WHAT THE DICKENS!
THE 2012 OLYMPICS
THE GUNFIGHT AT...
THE "OK" CORRAL
(Alex: And each correct response in that category will begin with the letters "O-K".)
